short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set your websites' own custom background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions come with ability to change the background of your web page by using the image of your choice.
Also, now it facilitates you to chat in group with people who are using the site and extension together.
Currently this works with VIT, Vellore academic site.
